game.name: Demons Roots

game.shortDescription: In a final struggle for survival, demonkind again invaded the human world. However, the world they return to after years in the darkness isn't the same as it once was...

reviewHighlights.text: Didnt think i would make a serious review about a game with sexual content tag. Found the game while searching reddit, and decided to give it a try si...
Demons Roots is one of those once-in-a-lifetime experiences. It is as close as you can get to a perfect JRPG experience, and anyone who considers them...
